languages.text: {n}Темные глаза друкари прищуриваются от довольства.{/n} "Я не сомневался в том, что услышу".
{n}Marazhai's eyes narrow in satisfaction.{/n} "I had no doubts about what I would hear."
languages.original_text: {n}Темные глаза друкари прищуриваются от довольства.{/n} "Я не сомневался в том, что услышу".

languages.text: {n}マラズハイは満足そうに目を細めた。{/n}「思った通りだ」
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai's eyes narrow in satisfaction.{/n} "I had no doubts about what I would hear."

traits.locale_text: {n}マラズハイは満足そうに目を細めた。{/n}「思った通りだ」
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}玛拉斋满意地眯起了眼睛。{/n}“我早就知道会听到这样的答案。”
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai's eyes narrow in satisfaction.{/n} "I had no doubts about what I would hear."

traits.locale_text: {n}玛拉斋满意地眯起了眼睛。{/n}“我早就知道会听到这样的答案。”
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Marazhai plisse les yeux avec satisfaction.{/n} « C'est bien ce que je pensais. »
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai's eyes narrow in satisfaction.{/n} "I had no doubts about what I would hear."

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai plisse les yeux avec satisfaction.{/n} « C'est bien ce que je pensais. »
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Marazhai entrecierra los ojos, satisfecho.{/n} «No tenía ninguna duda sobre lo que ibas a decidir».
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai's eyes narrow in satisfaction.{/n} "I had no doubts about what I would hear."

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai entrecierra los ojos, satisfecho.{/n} «No tenía ninguna duda sobre lo que ibas a decidir».
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Marazhai kneift zufrieden die Augen zusammen.{/n} "Ich hatte keinen Zweifel, dass ich genau das hören würde."
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai's eyes narrow in satisfaction.{/n} "I had no doubts about what I would hear."

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai kneift zufrieden die Augen zusammen.{/n} "Ich hatte keinen Zweifel, dass ich genau das hören würde."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Marazhai'ın gözleri, memnuniyetle kısılıyor.{/n} "Bunu duyacağımdan hiç kuşkum yoktu."
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai's eyes narrow in satisfaction.{/n} "I had no doubts about what I would hear."

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai'ın gözleri memnuniyetle kısılıyor.{/n} "Duyacaklarıma dair hiç kuşkum yoktu."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion
